    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Nov 28, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/mediacommunication
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">

             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>

            <div id="lgsearch_field" class="lgsearch_item">

            </div>
           </td>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10440148">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10440148">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10440148">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting Started with Reference Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10139332">
          <p>
           The resources on this page can help you to
           <strong>
            brainstorm
           </strong>
           topic ideas,
           <strong>
            narrow
           </strong>
           your topic to make it more manageable, or learn
           <strong>
            background
           </strong>
           information about a topic you have picked.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10139332" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10453144">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10453144">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10453144">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias, Handbooks, and More
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10453144">
          <p>
           To find more print and online reference books for general media and communication studies topics, as well as specific subjects within or related to the field, search Encompass Search or ask for help.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10453144" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12706109">
              <a id="link_12706109" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706109,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for media and communication studies. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706220">
              <b>
               Encyclopedia of Children, Adolescents, and the Media
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 302.23083 E56o vol. 1-2 (Level B)
               <br />
               In-depth entries on topics related to mass media and children/teenagers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706111">
              <b>
               Encyclopedia of Communication and Information
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 302.203 E56o vol. 1-3 (Level B)
               <br />
               In-depth entries on a variety of communication-related topics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706124">
              <b>
               Encyclopedia of Media and Politics
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 302.230973 E56o (Level B)
               <br />
               In-depth entries related to political aspects of mass media.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706150">
              <b>
               Encyclopedia of Television
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 384.5503 E56o vol. 1-4 (Level B)
               <br />
               In-depth entries on a variety of television-related topics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706110">
              <b>
               International Encyclopedia of Communication
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 302.203 I56e vol. 1-12 (Level B)
               <br />
               In-depth entries on a variety of communication-related topics.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10453277">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10453277">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10453277">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources for Newspapers and Magazines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10453277">
          <div id="boxatt10453277" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12706239">
              <a id="link_12706239" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706239,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including media and communication. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706241">
              <a id="link_12706241" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706241,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369574}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706240">
              <a id="link_12706240" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706240,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">

  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
